name: Brewer's Yeast
description: A type of yeast used in brewing beer and making potions.
looks: It is a fine, powdery substance that is light brown in color.

name: Shield of Protection
description: A sturdy shield that provides excellent protection against physical attacks.
looks: The shield is made of reinforced steel and has a golden emblem of a lion in the center.

name: Fireball Staff
description: A staff that allows the user to conjure and launch fireballs.
looks: The staff is made of polished wood with a ruby gem embedded at the top. It emits a faint glow.

special_weapon_skills.Fire Magic: Allows the user to cast fire spells with increased effectiveness.

special_effects.Burning: Fireball has a chance to cause burn damage over time.

name: Lightning Staff
description: A wooden staff crackling with electricity.
looks: The staff is made of polished oak with intricate carvings and a crystal on top that crackles with electricity.

special_weapon_skills.Staff Mastery: Increases damage and accuracy with staffs.

name: Brewer's Yeast
description: A key ingredient used in brewing potions.
looks: A small packet of dried, powdery substance.

name: Protection Potion
description: A potion that grants temporary damage resistance and increases defense.
looks: The potion is a thick, golden liquid swirling with shimmering particles.

name: Elemental Staff
description: A staff that harnesses elemental powers.
looks: The staff is made of wood, adorned with intricate carvings and embedded with gemstones that glow with elemental energy.

special_weapon_skills.elemental_magic: Increases the effectiveness of elemental magic spells.

special_effects.elemental_fury: Chance to unleash a powerful elemental attack with each swing.

name: Flaming Sword
description: A sword imbued with the power of fire, dealing additional fire damage to enemies.
looks: The sword has a sleek, silver blade with intricate engravings. The hilt is wrapped in red leather, and it emits a faint orange glow.

name: Speed Boots
description: A pair of boots that greatly increase movement speed.
looks: The boots are made of sleek black leather with silver accents.

name: Instant Health Potion
description: A potion that instantly restores a large amount of health.
looks: A small glass vial filled with a bright red liquid.
